sources.title: The Crooked Way (1949)
sources.description: A war veteran suffering from amnesia, returns to Los Angeles from a San Francisco veterans hospital hoping to learn who he is and discovers his criminal past. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/the-crooked-way-1949/

sources.title: The Crooked Way (1949) John Payne, Sonny Tufts, Ellen Drew
sources.description: The Crooked Way is a 1949 film noir crime film directed by Robert Florey. The film was based on a radio play No Blade Too Sharp and features John Payne, Sonny Tufts, Ellen Drew and others. Find out more about the movie here .

metadata.Plot: After being released from hospital, a World War II veteran who's suffering from amnesia decides to return to Los Angeles to see if he can regain his identity. Retracing his former steps, he learns he was a gangster, and many wish he were dead....and some try to see to it.
metadata.Actors: John Payne, Sonny Tufts, Ellen Drew
